Role: Controller.

Power Source: Arcane.

Key Abilities: Charisma; Dexterity or Intelligence

Armor Proficiencies: Cloth, leather.

Weapon Proficiencies: Simple melee, simple ranged.

Implement: Rods, wands

Bonus to Defense: +1 Reflex, +1 Will.

Hit Points at 1st Level : 12+ Constitution Score.

Hit Points per Level Gained : 5

Healing Surges per Day : 6+ Constitution Modifier.

Trained Skills : From the class skills list below, choose 4 trained skills at 1st level.

Class Skills : Arcana (Int), Bluff (Cha), Dungeoneering (Wis), History (Int), Insight (Wis), Intimidate (Cha), Religion (Int), Streetwise (Cha), Thievery (Dex).

Class features: Level 1 Binder Daily Power, Level 1 Pact Encounter Power, Pact Boon (Binder), Shadow Claws, Shadow Twist, Shadow Walk.

 

WARLOCK (BINDER) CLASS FEATURES

Level 1:

Level 1 Binder Daily Power

You gain a 1st-level warlock daily attack power of your choice.

Hateful Shade; Web of Shadows;

Level 1 Pact Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your pact.

Level 1 Fey Pact Encounter Power; Unseelie Sprites; Level 1 Gloom Pact Encounter Power; Hound of Dark Omen; Level 1 Star Pact Encounter Power; Shadow Tentacles;

Pact Boon (Binder)

You gain an at-will attack power and a utility power associated with your pact.

Fey Pact Boon (Binder); Cloud Sight; Fascinating Shadows; Gloom Pact Boon (Binder); Echoing Dirge; Shadow Warp; Star Pact Boon (Binder); Hidden Lore; Mind Shadows;

Shadow Claws

You gain the shadow claws power.

Shadow Claws;

Shadow Twist

You gain a +1 bonus to ranged attack rolls and area attack rolls against any enemy that has no other creature adjacent to it.

Shadow Walk

On your turn, if you move at least 3 squares away from where you started your turn, you gain concealment until the end of your next turn.

Level 2:

Level 2 Binder Utility Power

You gain a 2nd-level warlock utility power of your choice.

Shade Twin; Spectral Fade;

Level 3:

Level 3 Pact Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your pact.

Level 3 Fey Pact Encounter Power; Lure of Loyalty; Level 3 Gloom Pact Encounter Power; Ebon Claws; Level 3 Star Pact Encounter Power; Void Blast;

Level 4:

Pact Lore

You gain a Pact Lore feature associated with your pact.

Fey Pact Lore; Gloom Pact Lore;

Level 5:

Star Pact Lore;

Level 5 Binder Daily Power

You gain a new warlock daily attack power of your level or lower.

Shard of Darkness; Well of Shadows;

Level 6:

Level 6 Binder Utility Power

You gain a new warlock utility power of your level or lower.

Shadow Ride; Walk Through Darkness;

Level 7:

Level 7 Pact Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your pact.

Level 7 Fey Pact Encounter Power; Touch of Command; Level 7 Gloom Pact Encounter Power; Pall of Darkness; Level 7 Star Pact Encounter Power; Cyst of Darkness;

Level 9:

Summon Warlock's Ally

You gain the summon warlock's ally power.

Summon Warlock's Ally; Binder's Ally (Fey); Binder's Ally (Gloom);

Level 10:

Binder's Ally (Star);

Level 10 Binder Utility Power

You gain a new warlock utility power of your level or lower.

Bridge of Shades; Shadow Armor;

Level 13:

Level 13 Pact Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your pact. This new power replaces the encounter attack power you gained at 1st level from your pact.

Level 13 Fey Pact Encounter Power; Fleeting Call; Level 13 Gloom Pact Encounter Power; Haunting Shadow; Level 13 Star Pact Encounter Power; Devouring Dark;

Level 15:

Level 15 Binder Daily Power

You can gain a new warlock daily attack power of your level or lower. If you do so, this new power must replace one of the daily attack powers you already have from your class (usually your lowest-level daily attack power).

Menacing Shadow; Oubliette of the Void;

Level 16:

Level 16 Binder Utility Power

You gain a new warlock utility power of your level or lower.

Offering of Blood; Soul of the Void;

Level 17:

Level 17 Pact Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your pact. This new power replaces the encounter attack power you gained at 3rd level.

Level 17 Fey Pact Encounter Power; Song of the Siren; Level 17 Gloom Pact Encounter Power; Devouring Tide; Level 17 Star Pact Encounter Power; Greater Void Burst;

Level 19:

Level 19 Binder Daily Power

You can gain a new warlock daily attack power of your level or lower. If you do so, this new power must replace one of the daily attack powers you already have from your class (usually your lowest-level daily attack power).

Shadow Mire; Star of Death's Omen;

Level 22:

Master Of Magic

You gain the master of magic power.

Master of Magic;

Level 23:

Level 23 Pact Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your pact. This new power replaces the encounter attack power you gained at 7th level.

Level 23 Fey Pact Encounter Power; Unwilling Betrayal; Level 23 Gloom Pact Encounter Power; Umbral Radiance; Level 23 Star Pact Encounter Power; Inner Void;

Level 25:

Greater Summon Warlock's Ally

You gain another creature that you can summon when you use summon warlock's ally. The specific creature depends on your pact.

Greater Binder's Ally (Fey); Greater Binder's Ally (Gloom);

Level 27:

Greater Binder's Ally (Star);

Level 27 Pact Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your pact. This new power replaces the encounter attack power you gained at 13th level.

Level 27 Fey Pact Encounter Power; Supplication of the Worms; Level 27 Gloom Pact Encounter Power; Umbral Swap; Level 27 Star Pact Encounter Power; Hungry Void;

Level 29:

Level 29 Binder Daily Power

You can gain a new warlock daily attack power of your level or lower. If you do so, this new power must replace one of the daily attack powers you already have from your class (usually your lowest-level daily attack power).

Draining Void; Shadow Legion;

Published in Heroes of Shadow, page(s) 67.
